summary:
Multi facet professional by academic education and research, hands‑on field and office experience with
strengths in commercial and technical understanding of O&G, Steel, components, automation & manufacturing industry businesses. Over 18 years of exposure to multidisciplinary challenges in international and highly competitive environments. Extensive and successful experience in developing, commercializing, delivering and managing operative solutions. Good communicator, team builder with a comprehensive understanding of its internal and external audience.
I support innovation and think BIG & long term!

profile_positions.description: Service Manager Benelux/ Business Unit Manager for dpt Process Systems & Solutions / Systems & Software at Emerson in Benelux! #Emerson
profile_positions.title: Service Manager Benelux /Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all commercial & marketing activities for the division in Benelux,
including the Tool Steel and Special Steel Portfolio and Value Added Services;

Proved to be successful to build supply chain to support such projects within the
voestalpine VAS companies in Europe as well as with the external partners;

Responsible for Inside and outside sales teams, steering the sales efforts to be
able to achieve the required output. Responsible for implementation of Sales
Force ( CRM ) in my division;

Responsible for developing the business strategy to match the targets of
voestalpine holding with the new focus on Value Added Services, as well as,
realizing the objectives based on Benelux market environment.

Coordination of activities between the production mills and Value Added Service
(VAS) centres to develop and support the turn ‑key projects for Benelux
customers.

Responsible for the legal and export control requirements for the commercial
operations for the division;

Responsible for Budgeting for 5 years ahead for the division products and
services, while respecting the personnel efficiency target, EBIT output, etc;
Responsible for the marketing and product development plan by sector:
Aero, Wind, Tool Makers, Industrial Components, Food and Beverage industry,
Industrial Knifes for Steel mills;

Changing mentality: managing to shift the commercial focus from the
conventional tool steel applications sales into the solution oriented packages,
where the objective is to push the Value Added Service and not pure sales of steel.
Those Value Added Service include rough machining, machining acc to drawing, including serivices such as PVD, CVD coating, storage, logistics and call off contracts. 

Responsible for several key accounts ( multi-million), for all legal,
compliance, commercial, operational terms and for the execution of contacts. Last
achievement 3 year global contract (NL & USA) with Power Generation
maintenance company for approx. 9 M - 3 yrs contract.
profile_positions.title: Sales (Division) Manager Benelux, Bohler

profile_positions.description:
Account Manager: Maintaining and developing client base, mainly focused on operators ( oil & gas, geothermal, Salt 
Mining) and major service providers in energy industry & drilling rig providers. Responsible for Casing 
Accessories & Float Equipment, OCTG, Wellheads product lines: technical support & advice; stock 
replenishment advice internal, promoting certain products. Representing 
the rest of product lines (PCE & Consumables, Drill String Equipment, Flowline) incl. services and rental dpt. Areas : NL, FR, UK, GE, DK.
